LanguageData.RiversEditorWindow_RemoveAllRiversInfo: All rivers on the planet are removed
LanguageData.RiversEditorWindow_RemoveModeChanged: Delete mode changed. Activation means removing rivers instead of creating.
LanguageData.RiversEditorWindow_CreateSource_WaterTil: Select a non-ocean or lake tile
LanguageData.RiversEditorWindow_CreateSource_NoOceans: There are no lake or ocean tiles nearby. To create a source, you need at least 1 lake or ocean tile nearby.
LanguageData.RiversEditorWindow_CreateSource_ClickInf: Select one of the highlighted tiles by clicking on them with LMB
